concept.title: AFMC PGI 5301.602-2 Responsibilities

li.p:
(c)(i)(A) In addition to the matters listed in AFFARS 5301.602-2 (c), contracting officers should obtain legal review for the following:
(20) Procurement integrity issues (21) Organizational conflict of interest issues (22) Matters related to defective pricing (23) Advance or pre-contract cost agreements (24) Undefinitized contract actions and change orders (initial issuance and definitization).
